name: The Boys
s_m_details: The Boys head out on a heroic quest to expose the truth about the Seven and Vought, the multibillion-dollar conglomerate that manages the superheroes and covers up their dirty secrets.

name: Money Heist
s_m_details: A criminal mastermind who goes by The "Professor has" a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history -- to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: John Wick 2
s_m_details: Renowned assassin John Wick sets out for Rome to duel with some of the deadliest killers to fulfil a vow he made. However, he soon learns that there is a huge bounty on his head.

name: Ant Man
s_m_details: Marvel's Ant-Man, or simply Ant-Man, is an American animated television series based on the Ant-Man comics published by Marvel Comics. It premiered on June 10, 2017 on Disney XD.

name: Panchayat
s_m_details: An engineering graduate, Abhishek, is unable to find a job of his calibre. So, he ends up working for a panchayat in a remote Indian village and deals with several mundane challenges.

name: Mirzapur
s_m_details: Akhandanand Tripathi made millions exporting carpets and became the mafia boss of Mirzapur. His son Munna an unworthy power-hungry heir stops at nothing to continue his father's legacy.

name: Daredevil
s_m_details: Matt Murdock manages to overcome the challenges that he faces due to him being blind since childhood and fights criminals as a lawyer and Daredevil.

name: Moon Knight
s_m_details: Steven Grant and mercenary Marc Spector investigate the mysteries of the Egyptian gods from inside the same body.

name: Kota Factory
s_m_details: Like many students from across India, Vaibhav comes to Kota to prepare for JEE and NEET. Along with his friends, he navigates campus life and works hard to get into IIT.

name: Avengers
s_m_details: Nick Fury is compelled to launch the Avengers Initiative when Loki poses a threat to planet Earth. His squad of superheroes put their minds together to accomplish the task.

name: Collage Romance
s_m_details: College Romance Season 1 directed by Simarpreet Singh, premiered simultaneously on 7 August 2018 and it received a positive response from the audience.

name: Thor Love Of Thunder
s_m_details: Thor embarks on a journey unlike anything he's ever faced -- a quest for inner peace. However, his retirement gets interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic killer who seeks the extinction of the gods.

name: Gullak
s_m_details: Gullak is an Indian web series created by Shreyansh Pandey for the streaming service SonyLIV under the banner of The Viral Fever.

name: Uncharted
s_m_details: Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him find the lost fortune of Ferdinand Magellan. However, they face competition from Santiago Moncada, who believes that the treasure belongs to him.

name: The Vampire Diaries
s_m_details: On her first day at high school, Elena meets Stefan and immediately feels a connection with him. However, what she does not know is that Stefan and his brother, Damon, are in fact vampires.

name: Eesho
s_m_details: Eesho is an Indian Malayalam-language drama thriller film film directed by Nadirshah featuring Jayasurya and Namitha Pramod in the lead roles. The film written by Suneesh Varanad is produced by Arun Narayan.

name: Top Gun
s_m_details: After more than 30 years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete "Maverick" Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.

name: Jurassic World
s_m_details: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live and hunt alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures.

name: Eternals
s_m_details: The Eternals, a race of immortal beings with superhuman powers who have secretly lived on Earth for thousands of years, reunite to battle the evil Deviants.

name: Spider Man No Way Home
s_m_details: Spider-Man seeks the help of Doctor Strange to forget his exposed secret identity as Peter Parker. However, Strange's spell goes horribly wrong, leading to unwanted guests entering their universe.
